metadata.synopsis: One line AD result of having succeeded the passive perception check on a portrait warded by the Alarm spell. The player discovers a note hidden beneath the canvas.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Get close to an item such as the warded quartestaff in CTY_Main_A 709; -21; 707 and succeed investigation roll.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: A note, hidden beneath the canvas.
